agenda.description: HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES NOTICE OF PUBLIC HEARING COMMITTEE: Agriculture & Livestock TIME & DATE: 1:00 PM, Monday, March 4, 2019 PLACE: E1.016 CHAIR: Rep. Drew Springer The House Committee on Agriculture & Livestock and the Senate Committee on Agriculture will have a joint hearing Monday, March 4, 2019 at 1:00PM in the Capitol Extension Room E1.016 to hear invited testimony only from the following: Texas Farm Bureau Texas and Southwest Cattle Raisers Association Texas Cattle Feeders Association Texas Poultry Federation Texas Association of Dairymen Texas Corn Producers Plains Cotton Growers Inc. Texas Grain and Feed Association Texas Forestry Association Texas Grain Sorghum Producers Association Texas Food and Fuel Association NOTICE OF ASSISTANCE AT PUBLIC MEETINGS Persons with disabilities who plan to attend this meeting and who may need assistance, such as a sign language interpreter, are requested to contact Stacey Nicchio at (512) 463-0850, 72 hours prior to the meeting so that appropriate arrangements can be made.
